scripts.setup: yarn && yarn setup:env auto && yarn setup:db && yarn setup:packages
scripts.setup:packages: yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological --exclude ROOT --exclude docker-helpers run setup
scripts.pretest: yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological --exclude ROOT --exclude docker-helpers run pretest
scripts.posttest: yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological --exclude ROOT --exclude docker-helpers run posttest
scripts.lint: tsc -b && yarn prettier:all --check && yarn eslint . && yarn client check
scripts.depcheck: yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological --exclude ROOT --exclude docker-helpers exec depcheck
scripts.dev: yarn && yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological --exclude ROOT --exclude docker-helpers --exclude @app/client run codegen && yarn build && concurrently --kill-others --names "TSC,WATCH,RUN,TEST" --prefix "({name})" --prefix-colors "yellow.bold,yellow.bold,cyan.bold,greenBright.bold" "tsc -b --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --parallel --interlaced --exclude ROOT --exclude docker-helpers --exclude @app/client run watch" "yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --parallel --interlaced --exclude ROOT --exclude docker-helpers --exclude @app/client run dev" "yarn test:watch --delay 10"
scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological --exclude ROOT --exclude docker-helpers --exclude @app/client run build
